Name: E.Z
About the game: E.Z is a simple hardcore platformer game the goal being get across to the other side of each of the 100 levels while each death throws you back to the previous levels. With a semi-random level sequence, level variability and quick level swapping, E.Z is hard to get used to. It will bring a challenge to your skill, reaction, and adaptability. Minimalistic at its best, visually eye Pleasing Simple controls Challenging gameplay Chiptunes by RoccoW and Rolemusic IJWTHF gamemode for casual players
